You picked up a fire flower! All flowers allow you to throw various projectiles, in this case, fire. Press X to throw a fireball!
UNUSED
That orange object is a spring! Jump on it to bounce high! Boing!
You can jump higher when you hold the jump button. You can also dive for additional height.
UNUSED
UNUSED
Try switching characters by pausing the game (PRESS SPACE). Try switching to Luigi, who can jump higher.
Click a star to select a mission, collect more stars to unlock new worlds!
Missed something? Walk back to the left to grab it!
To access this big star, you need to collect the other power stars.
You might need to press the dive key to reach that platform.
See that block... there might be goodies in it! Break it by hitting it with your head... or your fist... I'm not sure...
UNUSED
Welcome to the village. Use the ARROW KEYS, or A and D to move Mario. Try walking to the right!
Use the UP KEY or W to jump over that pipe, use the DOWN KEY or S to dive and move faster.
Press F to use your special ability! Here, Mario gets a fire power, but each character has a different skill.
Toad¶Hey there Mario! Princess Peach is waiting for you at the castle!
Toad¶Woah... look at all the stars...
Toad¶Welcome to the Mushroom Kingdom... you knew that... right?
Luigi¶Hey there bro! Happy Mushrrom Festival!

Captain Toad¶ Happy Mushroom Festival! I hope we can adventure after this...
Dear Mario¶Please come to the castle.¶I have something special for you.¶Princess Peach

You need more power stars to open this door!

You picked up... a goo flower?! Press X to shoot slime balls and stick enemies to the ground.

You can now play as Wafano!

aZF.text:
BUGS

(SMS-011) Pressing Up and Right while entering Bowser Jr's Airship crashes the game (discovered by @redyoshi857)
(SMS-015) Timer in Time Attack mode causes large amounts of lag to the game (discovered by @redyoshi857)
(SMS-016) Dev Mode cheat list overlaps the button to toggle cheats (discovered by @redyoshi857)
(SMS-018) Husk does not have animations and is just an overlay of Luigi (not really a bug but needs to be changed ASAP as it detriments from using Husk) (discovered by @redyoshi857)
(SMS-019) Stefano is unlocked after beating Caveman Cliff Hike, not Showdown on the Falls (discovered by @redyoshi857)
(SMS-020) Using the Invincibility cheat causes game to crash (discovered by @redyoshi857)
(SMS-021) Watching the whole cutscene where Peach is kidnapped doesn't count the cutscene as finished, so the music still plays and you can click to skip (discovered by @redyoshi857)
(SMS-022) Coin blocks give all 10 coins at once rather than one at a time (discovered by @redyoshi857)
(SMS-023) Midway through the Cloud Ship Scralaxy Time Trial there's a spot that causes you to glitch through the floor and die (discovered by @redyoshi857)
(SMS-024) Ceiling detection can sometimes cause the player to glitch through the floor and die (possibly related to SMS-023?) (discovered by @DjDmaster)
(SMS-025) Fireballs do not have wall or ceiling detection (discovered by @DjDmaster)
(SMS-026) Infinite coins at the end of The Underground (discovered by various people)
(SMS-027) Bosses do not despawn after leaving the boss screen (discovered by @DjDmaster)
(SMS-028) Objective-a-thon timer counts down while in pause menu (discovered by @DjDmaster)
(SMS-029) Sometimes the warp pipe to Green Grass Scralaxy does not appear (discovered by @ZappyBarbecue10)
(SMS-030) Cutscene does not count as “finished” unless clicked to skip, even if you do so after the intended end (discovered by @redyoshi857 and @ZappyBarbecue10)
(SMS-031) Star collection screen overflows through costumes causing a different character to sometimes appear (discovered by @ZappyBarbecue10)
(SMS-032) Diving or jumping into a galoomba sometimes causes the player to take damage (discovered by @redyoshi857 in 0.2.9, @ZappyBarbecue10 post-0.4.8)
(SMS-033) Time Attack mode does not exit when exiting a stage (discovered by @ZappyBarbecue10)
(SMS-035) Jump noise plays multiple times when jumping (discovered by @ExplodedMushroom)
(SMS-036) In mobile mode jumping is only possible at lowest height (discovered by @ZappyBarbecue10)
(SMS-037) Pausing during cutscenes is possible (discovered by @ZappyBarbecue10)
(SMS-038) Ongoing wall collision issues (discovered by @ZappyBarbecue10)
(SMS-039) Double jump possible in starting room of castle when entering doors (discovered by @scramaso)
(SMS-040) Possible to get stuck in broken Mushroom Festival level from unfinished missions. Will be fixed when all levels are implemented! (discovered by @lev1up)
(SMS-041) Falling into a pit while switching screens causes either death or wall clipping (discovered by @theboss19283)
(SMS-042) Turning into Fire Mario and entering a pipe at the same time causes the powerup to not go away eventually (discovered by @theboss19283)
(SMS-043) Dying while in a minecart causes all enemies to do no damage to you for the rest of the minecart segment (discovered by @redyoshi857)
(SMS-044) Minecart levels are way too difficult for their location in the game
(SMS-045) Background in the Peach getting kidnapped cutscene shakes out of place exposing the bugged out normal game behind (discovered by @redyoshi857 and @Speedy663)
(SMS-046) Exiting Spearhead Showdown does not despawn Giant Spearhead (discovered by @gaming_spider999)
(SMS-048) Minecart Mayhem is unable to be beaten (discovered by @redyoshi857)
(SMS-049) Collecting Cloud Ship Scralaxy's Grand Star does not allow the player to open the door to the Basement (discovered by @redyoshi857)
(SMS-050) Star counter in pause menu renders above guide and shop (discovered by @redyoshi857)
(SMS-052) “Welcome to the Scralaxy” text does not disappear immediately when exiting a level (discovered by @gaming_spider999)
(SMS-053) On the 7th screen of The Adventure Begins, going back a level causes repeated death (discovered by @gaming_spider999)
(SMS-054) Hitbox sometimes is visible (discovered by @gaming_spider999)
(SMS-055) Mario's dive will sometimes cause him to use Luigi voice clips (discovered by @SuperStarterSquad)
(SMS-056) It is possible to double-jump in a minecart (discovered by @SuperStarterSquad)


IT'S NOT ALWAYS A BUG (or is it?)
- Lag. It's pretty natural unless there's some sprite spawning clones uncontrollably. Softlocks are often a consequence of important objects not spawning because the clone limit has already been reached,

KNOWN BUGS (0.6.5)
(SMS-041) Falling into a pit while switching screens causes either death or wall clipping (discovered by @theboss19283)
(SMS-043) Dying while in a minecart causes all enemies to do no damage to you for the rest of the minecart segment (discovered by @redyoshi857)
(SMS-044) Minecart levels are a bit too difficult for their location in the game (discovered by various people)
(SMS-054) Hitbox sometimes is visible (discovered by @gaming_spider999)
(SMS-061) Time Attack timer counts up while in pause menu (discovered by @-CreativeCatTest-)
(SMS-062) Dying several times while in a minecart can cause the player to spawn out of it (discovered by @-CreativeCatTest-)
(SMS-063) The Character Selector in the pause menu doesn't always work (discovered by @beancity)
(SMS-065) At one point in “Grand Tree Climb”, you walk up a slant and you get transported to the bottom (could actually be made into a mechanic)(discovered by @DoritoDude123)
(SMS-066) The level music briefly plays once or twice before returning to the castle (discovered by @DoritoDude123)
(SMS-067) It is possible to press menu buttons freely while the game asks for a save code. (discovered by @-CreativeCatStudios-)
(SMS-068) The Save icon in the pause menu appears in the shop while in levels. (discovered by @-CreativeCatStudios-)

(Scralaxy-001) | In Fantastic Falls Scralaxy, you retain the powerup you have
when returning to Peach's Castle, allowing you to use the ability inside the
castle. | (Discovered by: YaBoy_Yodes)

aD.text:
0 = entry
1-4 = center
5-14 = hallway (odds = left, evens = right)
15-39 = level rooms

aZH.text:
WHAT NEEDS TO BE DONE TO FINISH CURRENT LEVELS:.
- Fantastic Falls: Add Madame Brood as a miniboss.
- Cloud Ship: Add Bowser Jr. as a boss.

aZI.text:
NEW LEVELS:

How to use:
The level progression HAS to follow the list below. Every room in the castle is designed for these levels, so don't add your own.
There already are some level graphics you could use. Check them out in the "Graphics for New Levels" project over at https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/369992445
Music should be chosen when the scralaxy is made unless otherwise specified.
Minibosses and bosses can be found by searching for them on Google, they are all Mario characters.
Please try to follow the level design, ask me (@redyoshi857) if you have any questions.

Tiki Tropic Scralaxy
Miniboss: Donkey Kong
Level Design: A tiki village on a beach, then a treehouse with a Donkey Kong-style level similar to the New Donk City Festival.

Spooky Space Scralaxy
Music: Yoshi's Island castle theme??
Level Design: A ghost house, both from the outside and inside 

Shipwreck Scralaxy
Music: Dire Dire Docks
Boss: Triclyde
Level Design: A shipwreck boss scralaxy.

Searing Sand Scralaxy
Music: NSMBU Desert Theme
Miniboss: Fryguy
Level Design: The original World 2 from 0.4.7.

Tree Maze Scralaxy
Music: Beware the Forest's Mushrooms from Super Mario RPG
Level Design: A level progression maze with a dense forest theme (like if SMW Forest of Illusion was a level)

Sweet Sweet Scralaxy
Music: Sweet Sweet Kingdom (MK8D)
Miniboss: Birdo
Level Design: A mix of Sweet Sweet Kingdom and Sweet Sweet Galaxy. Maybe a little Luncheon Kingdom mixed in?

Flashback Scralaxy
Level Design: 2-3 from SM3DL

Fire Castle Scralaxy
Music: Some Mario castle music, choice of whoever makes the scralaxy.
Boss: Bowser
Level Design: A fiery castle. 'Nuff said.

Shiver Cliff Scralaxy
Miniboss: Chief Chilly
Level Design: An ordinary snow level.

Giant Block Scralaxy
Miniboss: Goomboss
Level Design: World 4 from SMB3

Mesa Mine Scralaxy
Level Design: A gold mine underneath a mesa. Featuring a more advanced version of the Deep Delve Scralaxy minecart track

Ice Slide Scralaxy
Music: Slider from SM64
Level Design: An icy level based on sliding and racing a penguin.

Shiverburn Scralaxy
Boss: Two bosses, one for fire and one for ice
Level Design: A level with both fire and ice.

Raging Flame Scralaxy
Miniboss: Wart
Level Design: Ordinary lava level.

Metropolis Scralaxy
Music: something from Mario Kart
Level Design: A large city with big architecture and moving lights

Fire Factory Scralaxy
Miniboss: Tatanga
Level Design: A factory. Also kind of orange and filled with fire.

Moon Base Scralaxy
Music: Moon Kingdom
Level Design: A moon base, of course.

Summit Scralaxy
Music: Silence before the boss rush, then boss music, then silence after that.
Bosses: Dry Bowser, King Boo, Boolossus
Level Design: A boss rush on the volcano summit which reaches up to space. Starts with Dry Bowser who is angry at Mario for killing him, then King Boo appears and reveals he was the pilot of the UFO and the unknown force Wart and Tatanga were working with. Once he is defeated, he uses the last Grand Star to transform into Boolossus. After he is defeated, the power star is collected and the ending happens.

eX.text: Do not modify this block, and instead use it when there is a door-like transition. The transition consists of two black bars going to the edges of the screen while they disappear, and it is there to create the illusion of a door opening.

eY.text: Do not modify this block, and don't use it. It is already finished.

a12.text: If health > 0, that means you've hit the reset button in the pause menu, so you haven't died. This way, the reset sequence is different to the death sequence.

  Alt 5: Life-Up

  Alt 7: Ice Flower
  Alt 8: Goo Flower
  Alt 9: Mega Mushroom

4. Box
5. Flip Switch

  Alt 2: Blue

aD.text:
HUB LEVEL VARIABLE
0 = entry
1-4 = center
5-14 = hallway (odds = left, evens = right)
15-39 = level rooms
40-42 = outside

hJ.text: This determines what star the clone is IN TOTAL

h].text: This determines what costume (new or normal) should the star have based on the above script.

d@.text: this determines what stage should start

c~.text: this decides whether you should be let into the level or not

a2/.text:
Some information on Boss variables

Boss Health: the current boss health, managed by the on-screen boss.

Total Boss Health: the health the boss has at the beginning of the fight.

Boss ID: indicates the number of the current on-screen boss.
Handled directly by this sprite.
Values:

1 = Spearhead

SOUND_MENU: Super Mario 3D Land Sound-Luigi let's a go.mp3

e3.text: pressing space will speed up the text

a3a.text: currently there are 2 types of text animation, you can add more easily

a3b.text: Use pitch instead of 27 sounds, to save assets and still randomise sound effects

a3d.text: if no x position is given, the current position of the sprite is used

a3f.text:
If no wrap position is given, '1000' is used.

This number really doesn't matter, you can change it to whatever you want!

a3j.text:
This code makes the text slow down if it hits certain punctuation like . ! , " '

This is determined by what is in the 'textPause' list.

If space is held, text is slown down less.

a3l.text: Delays the text, if needed for effect

a3p.text:
This code makes the text slow down if it hits certain punctuation like . ! , " '

This is determined by what is in the 'textPause' list.

If space is held, text is slown down less.

a3r.text: Delays the text, if needed for effect

a3t.text: whether the text animates, or just appears

a3v.text: currently there are 2 types of text animation, you can add more easily

a3x.text: if no x position is given, the current position of the sprite is used

a3z.text:
If no wrap position is given, '1000' is used.

This number really doesn't matter, you can change it to whatever you want!

a3D.text: whether the text animates, or just appears

a3F.text: currently there are 2 types of text animation, you can add more easily

a3N.text:
This code makes the text slow down if it hits certain punctuation like . ! , " '

This is determined by what is in the 'textPause' list.

If space is held, text is slown down less.

a3P.text: Delays the text, if needed for effect

a3T.text:
This code makes the text slow down if it hits certain punctuation like . ! , " '

This is determined by what is in the 'textPause' list.

If space is held, text is slown down less.

a3V.text: Delays the text, if needed for effect

a3X.text: whether the text animates, or just appears

a3Z.text: currently there are 2 types of text animation, you can add more easily

a3#.text:
HOW TO USE CUSTOM BLOCK

FIRST BOX -> Text you want to write

Size -> Size of text

Pos -> Starting x and y positions of text

Anim -> What animation (if any) the text should use, set to 0 to not animate

Wrap at -> Where the text should wrap as an x value

Group -> What group the text is part of, you can set this to anything or leave blank to set it to a 'BLANK' group

Col/bright -> The colour and brightness of the text, set brightness to 100 for white text

Tags -> Special effects the text could use, if any

Volume -> The volume the sounds the appearing text makes

a3%.text: Use '¶' in a string to break a line instantly
